name: GHA PR Comment with E2E Results
description: Run E2E and comment summary on PR using github-script.

files.template:
name: E2E and Comment

on: [pull_request]

jobs:
  e2e:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm run -s test:e2e || echo 'no e2e'
      - name: Comment PR
        uses: actions/github-script@v7
        with:
          github-token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          script: |
            const body = 'E2E completed. Check artifacts/logs for details.';
            github.rest.issues.createComment({ owner: context.repo.owner, repo: context.repo.repo, issue_number: context.issue.number, body });
